message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. It's a great deal, and I think you'll find it's worth every penny.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate you're willing to negotiate.  I'm really interested in the product, but I'm only able to offer $10500 right now. What do you think?

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to consider your proposal, but I'm still looking for a better deal. I'm thinking of offering you a compromise - I'll sell the product to you for $11500. What do you think?
